title: New: Azealia Banks – NEEDSUMLUV (SXLND)
body:
What better way to honour the late, great **Aaliyah** than for this years most exciting young R’n’B artist to release a fresh track featuring a sample from the singer, who would have been 33 today.

**Azealia Banks’s** _NEEDSUMLUV (SXLND)_ finds her taking up Machinedrum’s original beat, and marking it with her own unique style. Sure, it’s still highly explicit and NSFW, but hey, we can’t all be good, right? Oh, and it’s a free download as well.

 [NEEDSUMLUV (SXLND)](http://soundcloud.com/azealia-banks/needsumluv-sxlnd) by [Azealia Banks](http://soundcloud.com/azealia-banks)
